title: Magic Resist not working like before?
body:
So is it just me or is MR not working (or weaker) since the new rune/mastery system came out??

I had a game where 4 of the opposite team were magic damage so I went MR tank but was still getting killed so easily whereas before I was able to tank quite well.

Or maybe I just have my pages setup wrong.

replies.body: With the removal of old runes also removes MR runes. Champions have exceptionally low base MR's and growths so its all fucked up now
Ap = true damage now, didn't you know?

Which game is this?

Because i don't see an MR tank against a 4 man of AP on your OP.GG
